titles.title: Excess Urban Heat Mitigation Act of 2022
Excess Urban Heat Mitigation Act of 2022
A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish an excess urban heat mitigaiton grant program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Excess Urban Heat Mitigation Act of 2022
This bill requires the Department of Housing and Urban Development to establish a grant program for state, tribal, and local governments; metropolitan planning organizations; and certain nonprofits (or consortia of nonprofits) to carry out activities to mitigate heat in urban areas.
